name: resource-gen
author: Vincent Reynaud <mail@vincentreynaud.de>
description: Utility to parse webloc & browser-printed pdf files into a comprehensive list of links in Markdown

scripts.test: node cli.js '/Users/vincentreynaud/Dropbox/Development DCI/tools-and-resources' dev-tools-and-resources -l -i _snippets liked gatsby -t 'Useful Web Development Links'
scripts.test-ca: node cli.js '/Users/vincentreynaud/Desktop/FILES/WORK/1 Production/1 COLLECTIVE ANXIETY/2 Research/3 The Future?' test-ca -l
scripts.pre-publish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run gen --
